Posts.Content: make sur you eat ice chips all thru chemo / and drink lots of water. will help with mouth sores / buy plastic knifes etc for it will help with metal taste . take thrush med. for mouth sores starting 2nd day after chemo so you get a head start on them, helped me
Posts.Title: Hey newbiefromcananda

Posts.Content: if you still have long hair, cut it as short as you can, you will lose it by the next chemo. and it is a mess. makes it a bit easier///hard losing it. but remember it does grow back. like baby new hair. i do chemo in hamilton,,you?
Posts.Title: Hey newbiefromcananda

Posts.Content: its DD AC - T chemothererapy. has anbody did this one.how was it. and then i have to do radation..will still leave 75% of it coming back.
Posts.Title: found out what kind of chemo i will be doing

Posts.Content: just keep your faith, you will get this back
